text: @realDonaldTrump Would that be the same Abe Lincoln you said was never treated as badly as you? We're 75 away from reaching 70,000 #Coronavirus deaths here in America, & ^ THIS is what you spend your time doing while Americans lay dying. You're a disgrace to our nation. https://t.co/TcepvsJ4yy

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
